name: ARiddlefromBrainglecom
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: braingle
Developer Terms of Use
des: Braingle.com has hundreds of fun and challenging riddles. Use Alexa to get a random riddle by saying "Alexa, ask Braingle for a riddle". Some of the riddles are easy and some are quite challenging. If you need Alexa to repeat the riddle, you can ask her to repeat it. When you have a guess, just say "Is it a....." and see if you are correct.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
